医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
姜黄中的天然化合物可能与奥美拉唑一样有效治疗消化不良烹饪香料姜黄中发现的天然化合物可能与奥美拉唑一样有效；用于抑制胃酸过多的药物-；在线发表在《BMJ 循证医学》杂志上的第一项此类研究表明，可用于治疗消化不良症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Natural-compound-in-turmeric-may-be-as- effective-as-奥美拉唑-for-treating-indigestion.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Natural-compound-in-turmeric-may-be-as- effective-as-omeprzo-for-treating-indigestion.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=71b8b550-7633-4330-91fd-f801c304f245 Tue, 12 Sep 2023 14:16:49 -0400 Natural compound in turmeric may be as effective as omeprazole for treating indigestion
调查显示，英国医学生打算离开 NHS 的比例惊人大约三分之一的英国医学生计划在毕业后 2 年内离开 NHS；要么出国行医，要么完全放弃医学——；这是同类最大规模调查的结果，发表在开放获取期刊 BMJ Open 上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Alarming-proportion-of-medical-students-in-the-UK-intend-to-leave-the-NHS-survey-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Alarming-proportion-of-medical-students-in-the-UK-intend-to-leave-the-NHS-survey-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=71bff0ff-e4da-4f82-8657-487248060c18 Tue, 12 Sep 2023 14:07:44 -0400 Alarming proportion of medical students in the UK intend to leave the NHS, survey reveals
干细胞可用于修复慢性阻塞性肺病患者受损的肺组织研究人员首次证明，可以利用慢性阻塞性肺疾病（COPD）患者自身的肺细胞修复受损的肺组织。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Stem-cells-can-be-used-to-repair-damaging-lung-tissue-in-COPD-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Stem-cells-can-be-used-to-repair-damaging-lung-tissue-in-COPD-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c9d1a5e8-f831-4eff-8e52-dc0a957a9db6 Tue, 12 Sep 2023 13:59:29 -0400 Stem cells can be used to repair damaged lung tissue in COPD patients
研究表明吸烟会加速衰老过程一项针对近 50 万人的研究表明，吸烟会缩短我们免疫系统白细胞中染色体的末端片段。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Smoking-can-accelerate-the-process-of-aging-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Smoking-can-accelerate-the-process-of-aging-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=114c23e5-146e-448e-9a65-2d760e0385f8 Tue, 12 Sep 2023 13:55:00 -0400 Smoking can accelerate the process of aging, study shows
电子烟与年轻人的慢性压力有关根据在意大利米兰举行的欧洲呼吸学会国际大会上发表的研究，使用电子烟的年轻人经历慢性压力的可能性是其两倍多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Vaping-linked-to-chronic-stress-in-young-people.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Vaping-linked-to-chronic-stress-in-young-people.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=84c9292a-b84e-491a-87b0-ef1e22963c5f Tue, 12 Sep 2023 13:48:05 -0400 Vaping linked to chronic stress in young people
间充质干细胞衍生的细胞外囊泡在多囊卵巢综合症治疗中显示出前景多囊卵巢综合症 (PCOS) 是一种普遍存在的内分泌疾病，影响全球数百万女性，影响她们的荷尔蒙平衡、生育能力和整体健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Mesenchymal-stem-cell-衍生-extracellular-vesicles-show-promise-in-PCOS-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Mesenchymal-stem-cell-衍生-extracellular-vesicles-show-promise-in-PCOS-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c32c90bc-dbef-479c-b4a5-de9e9916432d Tue, 12 Sep 2023 13:35:09 -0400 Mesenchymal stem cell-derived extracellular vesicles show promise in PCOS treatment
发现新型铁靶向化合物可阻碍癌细胞增殖亚利桑那大学癌症中心的研究人员发现了一类新的铁靶向化合物，可以阻碍实验室环境中培养的恶性细胞的增殖。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/New-class-of-iron-targeting-compounds-found-to-hamper-proliferation-of-cancer-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/New-class-of-iron-targeting-compounds-found-to-hamper-proliferation-of-cancer-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=362c2ba8-4499-4d42-85b5-23127b7c7628 Tue, 12 Sep 2023 13:22:29 -0400 New class of iron-targeting compounds found to hamper proliferation of cancer cells
鲱鱼子油在治疗牛皮癣方面的潜力研究人员调查了使用鲱鱼油治疗牛皮癣（一种非传染性皮肤病）的情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Herring-roe-oils-pottial-in-psoriasis-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Herring-roe-oils-pottial-in-psoriasis-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e6d69dc2-b415-4dbe-93b2-e45b34faf3fc Tue, 12 Sep 2023 12:52:00 -0400 Herring roe oil's potential in psoriasis treatment
COVID-19 疫苗与季节性流感疫苗联合接种是否安全有效？研究人员调查了在接受一剂或两剂 COVID-19 加强剂量的医护人员中，同时接种 COVID-19 和季节性流感疫苗的方案与单独接种 SARS-CoV-2 疫苗的效果和安全性的比较。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Is-the-coadministration-of-a-COVID-19-vaccine-with-a-seasonal-influenza-vaccine-safe-and-efficacious.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Is-the-coadministration-of-a-COVID-19-vaccine-with-a-seasonal-influenza-vaccine-safe-and-efficacious.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c40eff63-84c4-47b5-afbf-cacc6a9e0368 Tue, 12 Sep 2023 12:37:00 -0400 Is the coadministration of a COVID-19 vaccine with a seasonal influenza vaccine safe and efficacious?
队列研究显示，夜间睡眠模式与不健康的生活方式和糖尿病风险增加有关https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Evening-chronotype-linked-to-unhealthy-lifestyles-and-increased-diabetes-risk-reveals-cohort-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Evening-chronotype-linked-to-unhealthy-lifestyles-and-increased-diabetes-risk-reveals-cohort-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=daa47a44-ae3e-4492-bf60-b8042095abbd Tue, 12 Sep 2023 12:00:00 -0400 Evening chronotype linked to unhealthy lifestyles and increased diabetes risk, reveals cohort study
